attributes.action: Have a national Britain day to celebrate all things British and the forces for their work arounf the world.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every other country seems to have one isnt about time that our homeland, history and forces should be celebrated. we should have big a parade through london everyone getting the day off, to celebrate being british. the parade through london shall have massive floats with purely british things. e.g cadburys - james bond - harry potter - Aston Martins - royalty - music.
